Razorwing: I agree that there are other solutions to problems, Lady
Spire, but how can we apply them to the Minions? If you have a team
that could, then tell us what they can do.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Lady Spire:
> 
> "Ohh come on... You're great Jottun when situation require a
straight hit even a treacherous one..."and with a more sweet tone said
"But some siatuations needs, patient... tricks...  secrets plans... ya
know... the femenine touch... not just the fists"
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Nic 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Monday, August 22, 2005 10:38 PM
>   Subject: Re: Towards the Meeting, second invitation
> 
> 
>   Jotunn: Then the only person that fits your description and that I
>   would want to see in that position is Lord Elder, and then only if he
>   proves his good will! You, milady, have no military consciousness, and
>   I will never trust a Maximal on that matter.
> 
>   Razorwing looked at him with pure hatred in his eyes, but said nothing
>   for now.
> 
>   ***
> 
>   A reminder was sent to Lords Perseus and Elder about the meeting in
>   Relay City.
